alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 16 at 11:27PM EST until February 18 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Estill and Powell Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Thursday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning, reaching a crest of 18.0 feet by early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.8 feet on 03/13/1963. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 8 AM EST Friday.
